Google shares were up 1.35 percent to 635.26 US dollars in after-hours electronic trading after the strong earnings results and management shakeup were announced. , well-known egyptologist Zahi Hawass , on Thursday played down accounts of the break-in at the Museum and warned against "rumours." In a posting on his blog Zahi Hawass said the incident at the museum resulted in 70 broken objects, all of which can be restored. is just getting under way. The vehicles from the new minivan platform would be built in Windsor. "I am here with one message to tell you," Sergio Marchionne told workers Tuesday. The future of this plant is without doubt guaranteed. Windsor Assembly is Chrysler's oldest plant and the only automaking factory in North America running on three shifts. a decade ago when investors called for a more experienced business leader, prompting Mr Eric Schmidt , 55, to take over. But now the company is reverting to the old arrangement and Mr Eric Schmidt said: In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. "For the last ten years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. We're mobile!
